# Code Citations

## License: MIT
https://github.com/akshaymenon/akshaymenon.github.io/blob/3e01005840c9041d372efdbd0b4c3ef61f650a98/test.html

```
<style>
    .modal { display: none; position: fixed; z-index: 1; left: 0; top: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.4); }
    .modal-content { background-color: #fefefe; margin: 15% auto; padding: 20px; border: 1px solid #888; width: 80%; max-width: 600px; }
    .close { color: #aaa; float: right; font-size: 28px; font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer; }
    .close:hover { color
```
